text:
Faisal Hassan
Shaheen Bagh, Jamia Nagar, New Delhi - 110025
E-mail: faisal.hassan205@gmail.com
Phone: +919717039989, +917033565869
Electrical Engineering professional with Bachelor of Technology 
degree and more than 4 years of experience in Electrical Design, 
Maintenance & Execution of Electrical Installations in Building sector.
Work Experience:
Has been worked with Engineering & Works Directorate,
Royal Saudi Air Defence Forces as Electrical Engineer
(Site) from Dec 2012 to Feb 2016.
Has been worked with VOLTAS LTD., HYDERABAD on
contract basis as Graduate Trainee Engineer From Aug.
2011 to April 2012. 
Educational Qualifications:
Completed B.Tech in Electrical & Electronics Engineering
from Vidya Vikas Instt. of Tech. (JNTU, Hyderabad) in July
2011 with First class. 
Profile:
Execution of building services like Power, Lighting, MV/LV
cable routing and termination, Earthing, Electrical Panels,
control systems, low current implementation, testing and
commissioning, Electrical design etc. Also capable of
supervising detailed engineering works, coordinated shop
drawings, technical submittals, liaison with consultants,
coordinate with various disciplines and site supervision.
Ability to effectively communicate and coordinate with foremen/
charge hands and command respect and confidence.
Ability to coordinate with other contractors, main contractor
and consultant engineers and resolve issues of conflict in a
tactful and professional manner.
Ability to understand commercial aspects and highlight
additional works/variations to superiors.
Ability to effectively handle multiple tasks in a fast paced
environment.
Certificates:
Registered at Saudi Council of Engineers as Electrical
Engineer since March 2014 with Membership ID  164633.
Current Details:
Total Experience : 4+ Years
Joining Time : 15 Days
Expected Salary : Negotiable
Computer Skills:
Having good knowledge of AutoCAD 2D&3D
Having good knowledge of MS-office (Word, Excel, Powerpoint)
Personal Profile:

 07-08-1989
Sex: 
 Male
Marital Status:
 Married
Languages Known:
 English, Hindi, Arabic
